Judul: MEASURING THE INFLUENCE OF REFERENCE GROUP TOWARD THE USE OF HAND AND BODY LOTION AMONG TWEENAGE GIRLS IN BANDUNG
Abstrak: This study is done to find out how tweenagers in Indonesia be initiated, influenced and decided about which hand and body lotion product they would use. Reference group influence also becomes an important aspect to be studied because tweenagers are ranged after childhood but has not yet entered adulthood so it is important to know what kind of reference group that influence them in their decision using hand and body lotion product.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Budi Permadi Iskandar, MSP.
Kata Kunci: Tweenagers, Reference Group Influence. Decision To Buy.
